title: Looking For People To Spam Poro King Cheese Strats
body:
Looking for anyone, any rank to spam Poro King with me. (I'm plat 2)

{{champion:74}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:17}} 

Really want to do a Zyra, Heimerdinger, Illaoi & Teemo cheese! Think of all the units on the screen!
(would be a lot of free gold for the enemy team but would be worth a shot!)

Preferably I'd be Hiemer but I don't mind filling.

Open to other cheese strats.

Anyone in before it goes down?

replies.body: On poro king you don't really need to engage just use the king to tank tower and get the turrets to clear it in a second.
